text:
The Lenya web-site is out of date.

The ApacheCon links are for ApacheCon EU which has already passed.

The Copyright years in the page footers show 2008.

==

Regarding ApacheCon, you may wish to consider using

http://www.apache.org/events/

which will be updated to the next event as necessary.

See http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/infrastructure/site/trunk/xdocs/events/README.txt
creator: sebb@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text:
(In reply to comment #0)

> The Copyright years in the page footers show 2008.

Updated to 2009 in revision 778783. Should be live after the next website update.

creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
(In reply to comment #0)

> Regarding ApacheCon, you may wish to consider using
> 
> http://www.apache.org/events/
> 
> which will be updated to the next event as necessary.
> 
> See
> http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/infrastructure/site/trunk/xdocs/events/README.txt

Thanks a lot for the pointer!

I updated the banner template page in the authoring environment accordingly:

https://lenya.zones.apache.org/cms/docu/authoring/index/banners.html

The generic event banner will be live after the next website update.
